name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Asa - Minimal New Tab Page with Reddit feeds

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Minimal New Tab Extension integrated with Reddit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Asa Êúù ("Morning" in Japanese) is a minimal new tab page with weather forecast and Reddit integration.

Features

- Reddit feeds with sorting options
- Save your frequently visited subreddits
- Current condition and weather forecast for upcoming days
- Themes to suit your current vibe
- Configurable display options and temperature unit
- Offline supported (weather conditions and Reddit posts from cache)
- More coming soon...
